name: Notion - Habit Tracker
description: Transform your habits into routinesThis Habit Tracker template helps to automate your daily habits into routines. Try and make your life more organized with this simple habit tracker that is easy to set up.What you'll get: Fully support both light and dark mode design Habit records including progress bar formula Summary of your weekly habit statistics Include a guide that can help you understand how this template works Preview:Have questions?Hit me up at Twitter @mrizkiaiman or email at mrizkiai
features: Fully support both light and dark mode design; Habit records including progress bar formula; Summary of your weekly habit statistics; Include a guide that can help you understand how this template works
